description:
18.28 showvolume
Convert input audio volume to a video output.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: showvolume

options.description: Set border width, allowed range is [0, 5]. Default is 1.
options.name: b

options.description: Set channel width, allowed range is [80, 8192]. Default is 400.
options.name: w

options.description: Set channel height, allowed range is [1, 900]. Default is 20.
options.name: h

options.description: Set fade, allowed range is [0, 1]. Default is 0.95.
options.name: f

options.description:
Set volume color expression.

The expression can use the following variables:

VOLUME

Current max volume of channel in dB.

PEAK

Current peak.

CHANNEL

Current channel number, starting from 0.
options.name: c

options.description: If set, displays channel names. Default is enabled.
options.name: t

options.description: If set, displays volume values. Default is enabled.
options.name: v

options.description: In second. If set to > 0., display a line for the max level in the previous seconds. default is disabled: 0.
options.name: dm

options.description: The color of the max line. Use when dm option is set to > 0. default is: orange
options.name: dmc

options.description: Set orientation, can be horizontal: h or vertical: v, default is h.
options.name: o

options.description: Set step size, allowed range is [0, 5]. Default is 0, which means step is disabled.
options.name: s

options.description: Set background opacity, allowed range is [0, 1]. Default is 0.
options.name: p

options.description: Set metering mode, can be peak: p or rms: r, default is p.
options.name: m

options.description: Set display scale, can be linear: lin or log: log, default is lin.
options.name: ds
